Thanks for going the extra mile on this, it is truly appreciated!!! One vip member uploaded the R5 awhile ago and tried to pass it off as a dvdrip. This didn't fly because they admitted it had 27 sec. of Russian audio, shame on them.
thank you for putting out some quality work for us. the fixed audio is greatly appreciated
Thanks for uploading this version. Complete English dialog.
does this one have the audio the other ones are missing?

This one has ALL ENGLISH audio, all the way to the end of the movie. Thanx for the upload!  

Audio: 9 Video: 10(audio seems to go up and down just a little bit, but it's definitely tolerable)

Movie: 6  Too many plot jumps for me... fighting angels with human weapons? Who'da thunk it, lmao
thanks great up! good quality and audio!!! Can you get When In Rome and Youth In Revolt? Thanks!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Great video, but..... the audio has a "metallic tunnel" distortion to it.  Download the sample and you'll see what i mean.

You can remove most of it by using virtualdub's lowpass filter, but my question is:  WHY THE HELL didn't IMAGiNE just do that..??
